item.description:
You may be surprised to discover that the fulfillment you look for in relationships, shopping, travel, food, nature and countless other things can be experienced just by closing your eyes and connecting to God within.

In meditation, you can reach a perfect stillness in which you are receptive to God and God’s guidance for you. This is the way of those who have disciplined their minds and emotions to see and know God intimately.

It is the workbench of healing. It is the place of real peace. It is the direct path to God.

But it is not easy, and those who want to reap the benefits of meditation need to know what it takes to get there. Join us for this special seminar and learn about the art of real meditation.

 
Suggested Donation: $25 ~ Bring a Friend for Free
item.name: Meditation: The Direct Path to God
